title: Classic Disney Animated Films
description: From Snow White to The Jungle Book -- how well do you remember the magical animated films from Walt Disney Studios?

questions.question: Which Disney film was the first full-length animated feature in American cinema history, released in 1937?
options: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

questions.question: In 'Pinocchio' (1940), what does Pinocchio need to prove in order to become a real boy?
options: That he is brave, truthful, and unselfish
That he can go to school

questions.question: Which 1940 Disney film features classical music set to animated sequences, including 'The Sorcerer's Apprentice'?

In 'Cinderella' (1950), what do the mice call Cinderella?
Who provides the voice for the Cheshire Cat in Disney's 'Alice in Wonderland' (1951)?
In 'Peter Pan' (1953), what does Peter tell the children they need in order to fly?
options: A happy thought and pixie dust
